hey guys anyone who knows what glasses i need to watch side by side 3d movies?
what glasses i need in order to watch side by side movies?
You need the discoverer glasses in which one glass is of red color and another one is of cyan color. You will also need a 3d movie player like PowerDVD 12, Stereoscopic player.
